name: shopping-app
description: Shopping app written in Vue and Express

scripts.start-app:dev: npm run build-client:dev && npm run start-server:dev
scripts.start-app:prod: npm run build-client:prod && npm run start-server:prod
scripts.install-and-test: cd server && npm ci && cd ../client && npm ci && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test-server && npm run test-client

author: Muhammad Yahya
